summary: Australian detective Colin McLaren investigates the JFK assassination using ballistics expert Howard Donahue's evidence of a second shooter in Dealey Plaza.
cast: Alex Ivanovici|Howard Donahue|Colin McLaren|Colleen Lorenzen|Bonar Menninger|John Connally|Ralph Yarborough|Wyatt Bowen|Anne-Sophie Bozon|Shawn Campbell|Larry Day|Peter Michael Dillon|Tod Fennell|Raphael Grosz-Harvey|Stephanie Halin|Trevor Hayes|Michael Hearn|Mistaya Hemingway|Arthur Holden|Paul Hopkins|Dan Jeannotte|Richard Jutras|Marc-Antoine Kelertas|Roy Kellerman|Jacqueline Kennedy|John F. Kennedy|Vincent Leclerc|Alison Louder|Jonathan Maxwell Silver|Andrew Simms|Vanessa Volcy|Michael Whitener|Florin Peltea
title: JFK: The Smoking Gun
